project.name: Embedding API Index Validation
project.description: Validate that the /embedding API processes a blob from Azure Blob Storage, generates embeddings, and creates an index in Azure Cognitive Search.

preconditions: Azure Blob Storage contains valid JSON with Key_Value_Pairs, Tables, and Raw_Text.
CosmosDB connection string is correctly configured.
expected_result: Response is 'Indexing completed'. Index is created in Azure Cognitive Search. Blob and CosmosDB remain unchanged.
